mapper.select:
select id, name, address, area, `number`, `desc`, http, manage, `level`, `type`, city_id, school_code from sys_school where 1 = 1
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sysSchool.name},'%')
AND area LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sysSchool.area},'%')
AND manage LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sysSchool.manage},'%')
AND type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sysSchool.type},'%')
order by city_id desc
